components.name: Modern Footer
components.description: Professional footer with multiple column layout, company info, and organized navigation links. Includes contact details and social media links.
components.styleNotes: Uses CSS variables for theming, works well with all theme systems. Professional multi-column layout with organized sections.

components.name: Organized Business Footer
components.description: Clean business footer with company branding, organized navigation columns (Product, Company, Resources), social links, and copyright section.
components.styleNotes: Clean organized layout with clear navigation sections. Works well with professional themes and corporate branding.
